scripts.start-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && npm install && node server.js
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build || echo 'No backend build script found!'
scripts.test: npm run test-frontend && npm run test-backend
scripts.test-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm test || echo 'No backend tests defined!'
